Plot: The story of a forbidden and secretive relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years.
Title: Brokeback Mountain
Writer: Annie Proulx (short story), Larry McMurtry (screenplay), Diana Ossana (screenplay)
Actors: Heath Ledger, Jake Gyllenhaal, Randy Quaid, Valerie Planche
tomatoConsensus: A beautiful, epic Western, Brokeback Mountain's love story is imbued with heartbreaking universality thanks to moving performances by Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal.
